original_text: If you pay attention to these laws and are careful to follow them, then the Lord your God will keep his covenant of love with you, as he swore to your ancestors.
korean_text: 너희가 이 모든 법도를 듣고 지켜 행하면 네 하나님 여호와께서 네 조상들에게 맹세하신 언약을 지켜 네게 인애를 베푸실 것이라

sentences.original_text: If you pay attention to these laws
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 이 율법들에 주의를 기울인다면

sentences.original_text: and are careful to follow them,
will keep his covenant of love with you,
sentences.korean_translation: 당신과의 그의 사랑의 언약을 지키실 것이며,

sentences.original_text: as he swore to your ancestors.
